title: Enough with Colds & Flus!
cleaned_text: [ Enough with Colds & Flus! ](https://naturalmedicinenh.com/event/enough-colds-flus/) Essential Oil Solutions for Cold & Flu Season including the Flu Bomb! When: February 12th, 10:00am Where: Whole Health Concord's Classroom Come learn to employ pure and potent DoTERRA essential oils for better health for your family this season. We'll learn about the best oils for fever, flu, respiratory concerns and tummy troubles.
